resources.string: Once upon a time there was mighty Prince of Persia
He wanted to marry the princess of Arabia
He had a long journey to travel, on his way he meets the butchers of Saladin hungry for flesh
clang!clang! and his sword snaps due to overhardening
two swift strokes and he beheads the butchers
He had to stop for the night and sleep so he stops among the rocks
Tired from the journey he sleeps unaware and the robbers smash his head!!
The prince with gifted talent of acute hearing is well aware of his surroundings and defends himself
He reaches the palace and sees that the princess has a criteria for marriage which was:- Defeat the wild bison from central america
Bison overpowers and stamps on the chest of the prince
The prince with a lucky grab of the head uses the bison\'s force against itself to Win
The Prince of Persia marries the Princess of Arabia
